state_analysis: The command to retrieve Docker information has timed out again, indicating that the Docker service is still unresponsive. This behavior is persistent across multiple attempts to interact with the Docker daemon, suggesting a critical failure in the Docker installation or the underlying host system, preventing any command execution.
explanation: Since all previous attempts to troubleshoot the Docker environment have failed, I will now attempt to access system logs directly from the host machine to identify any errors or issues that may have occurred during operation. This will help diagnose the root cause of the unresponsiveness and determine the next steps for resolution.
